When the results are found, the 'select all', 'View by view,' and 'result list' buttons are displayed in the lower right corner, and only one result list button is displayed when the whole document is searched. The result list will display the found elements according to the page. Click the list name to collapse/expand the list element, and click the specific element to directly locate the element.If the number of search results is a little high, results list will not work good to show, so you can click it several times.
